clawbackDescription: Transfer all funds from the targeted child Safe to the parent Safe
createProposalTemplateDescription: Execution of this proposal will create a new proposal template, attached to this Safe.
removeProposalTemplateDescription: Execution of this proposal will remove the proposal template attached to this Safe.
lidoWithdrawalDescription: This proposal will burn your Lido Withdrawal NFT and return the ETH to your Safe.
unstakeStEthDescription: This proposal will unstake stETH from Lido and mint a Lido Withdrawal NFT which can be used to claim your ETH.
stakeWithLidoDescription: This proposal will stake ETH in Lido, returning stETH to your treasury.
